{{section.title}}

Include because?

Expectations need to be set for how to learn in Higher Education

Academic under preparedness = Early exit

Unresolved mismatched expectations cause ongoing conflict and academic failure

Approaches

Initiate students into appropriate studying methods for Higher Education

Direct students attention to sources of support in attaining study skills

Direct students attention to where and when, throughout the rest of the academic year, they can develop study skills

Promote reflective practice and self-evaluation
